mapper.select: SELECT * FROM wz_orders WHERE order_id = #{orderId} FOR UPDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE wz_orders SET status = #{status}, pay_time = #{payTime}, payment_id = #{paymentId}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime}, modified_user = #{modifiedUser}, version = version + 1 WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND version = #{version}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wz_order_items ( order_item_id, order_id, product_id, product_name, quantity, price, created_user, created_time ) VALUES ( #{orderItemId}, #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{createdUser}, NOW() )
